typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GetCostumer
GetCostumer select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='csclidt_cadastro'&&name!='csclino_doc'&&name!='csclitipo'&&name!='csusu_usuario'&&name!='csusu_senha'&&name!='csoproid_61'&&name!='csclicvisualizacao_web'&&name!='csusulalteracao'&&name!='csclicvisualizacao_sasgc'&&name!='cscliclioid_matriz'&&name!='cscliemail_nfe'&&name!='csdias'&&name!='cscliemail'&&name!='csclisistemafonte'&&name!='cscliorigem'&&name!='csalias'&&name!='csclidt_alteracao'&&name!='csclipaiscodigoiso'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns
RemoveColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SaveStCustumer
